messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] I am so frustrated with family.... anyone	out there will...
messages.msgSnippet: **I would physically buy and deliver to her a book or two on homeschooling. How about one about school?  I just read the eye-opening, appalling What Happened
messages.messageBody:
**I would physically buy and deliver to her a book or two on homeschooling.


How about one about school? I just read the eye-opening, appalling "What
Happened to Recess and Why Are Our Children Struggling in Kindergarten?" by
Susan Ohanian. It's about those great tests your sister is so worked up
about. **

I also like Alfie Kohn's book, The Schools Our Children Deserve. The
things he recommends, like following a child's interests, are easy to do
at home and hard to do in the classroom. And he backs up everything he
says with research.

Betsy
